description: Restrict access to an API by whitelisting or blacklisting consumers using arbitrary ACL group names. This plugin requires an authentication plugin (basic-auth, key-auth, etc) to have been already enabled on the API.

whitelist.description: Comma separated list of arbitrary group names that are allowed to consume the API. One of whitelist or blacklist must be specified.

blacklist.description: Comma separated list of arbitrary group names that are not allowed to consume the API. One of whitelist or blacklist must be specified.
